title: Money Exchange: Making a Request (Usefulness 8)
description: Traveler usefulness 8/10 phrases for the Making a Request subcategory within Money Exchange. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.english: I’d like to change US dollars into yen.
cards.romaji: Bei doru o en ni kaetai desu.
cards.japanese: 米ドルを円に替えたいです。

cards.english: I'd like to change Canadian dollars into yen.
cards.romaji: Canada doru o en ni kaetai desu.
cards.japanese: カナダドルを円に替えたいです。

cards.english: I'd like to change Australian dollars into yen.
cards.romaji: Osutoraria doru o en ni kaetai desu.
cards.japanese: オーストラリアドルを円に替えたいです。

cards.english: I'd like to change Euros into yen.
cards.romaji: Yuro o en ni kaetai desu.
cards.japanese: ユーロを円に替えたいです。
